author: alexei.fedotov@gmail.com
msg: Committed another part of the Issue 728. It is carefully tested for images, documents and presentations, other paths still may contain small glitches in the command line.

This is another step forward to use localized document names. By replacing command shell batch scripts with direct Runtime.exec() calls I remove requirement for using the batch file encoding which is hard to guess from the Java environment. A debug is performed by copying the command line from the error message window to the command line shell.

author: seba.wagner
msg: Fixes:  Issue 744:  	 Stability problem after several hours the Hibernate-Session seems to be broken or throws Strange Errors Was: Not see initial screen on r2036
++ Fixes some Exceptions related to NULL values in the Authentication

author: seba.wagner
msg: Fixes a broken Commit of r2039 and loads/flushes the SessionData of the User in more clear code, loads the config-key for encryption only one time anymore at APP-START as this is really not useful to select that key from the database everytime.

author: seba.wagner
msg: Try to Debug and Fix some of the stability problems of Issue 744
